title: Raising Mission-Minded Kids
itunes:author: Guest: Shauna Pilgreen
itunes:summary:
Shauna Pilgreen, author of Love Where You Live, discusses her family's experiences with church planting and describes how listeners can become missionaries right where they are, while teaching their kids to do the same.


Receive the book "Love Where You Live" and the audio download of the broadcast "Raising Mission-Minded Kids" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-09-16?refcd=1468903


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/raising-mission-minded-kids/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
